mapper.insert: insert into sys_file (id, file_name, saved_name, file_size, file_path,file_md5,file_progress,upload_time, create_by,create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{savedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update sys_file
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
saved_name = #{savedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy.id},
update_date = #{updateDate},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_md5 = #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_progress = #{fileProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where 1=1
and id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and file_md5 = #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select id, file_name, saved_name, file_size, file_path, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag from sys_file where id in
#{fileIds}
